system
Interface Computer

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ComputerImpl
public interface Computer
extends java.rmi.Remote

Defines a computer that can execute a Task. using Divide and conquer algorithm.

Author:
Manasa Chandrasekhar, Kowshik Prakasam

Method Detail

execute

Result<?> execute(Task<?> t)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Parameters:
t - Executes the divide and conquer phases of a generic Divide and conquer task on a remote machine
Returns:
Returns the object returned by the task's execute method. Clients should look at implementations of the abstract class : Job to understand the types of Result objects that can be returned by this method.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
